card.name: Adriana's Valor
card.property: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Whenever a creature you control with the chosen name attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, that creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

card.name: Assemble the Rank and Vile
card.property: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Creatures you control with the chosen name have "When this creature dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token."

card.name: Echoing Boon
card.property: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if it targets a creature you control with the chosen name, you may copy that spell and may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Emissary's Ploy
card.property: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) Before drawing your opening hand, choose 1, 2, or 3. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast creature spells with converted mana cost equal to the chosen number.

card.name: Hired Heist
card.property: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Whenever a creature you control with the chosen name deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Hold the Perimeter
card.property: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) At the beginning of your first upkeep, create a 1/2 white Soldier creature token with defender. At the beginning of each other player's first upkeep, that player creates a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Hymn of the Wilds
card.property: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) The first creature spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast. You can't cast instant or sorcery spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many attempt to speak with nature. Selvala speaks less, and nature answers more.

card.name: Incendiary Dissent
card.property: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Creatures you control with the chosen name have "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Natural Unity
card.property: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Creatures you control with the chosen name have "At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {G}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

card.name: Sovereign's Realm
card.property: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) Your starting deck can't have basic land cards and your starting hand size is five. Exile a card from your hand: This turn, you may play basic lands from outside the game. Basic lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Summoner's Bond
card.property: Double agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose two different card names. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal those names.) Whenever you cast a creature spell with one of the chosen names, you may search your library for a creature card with the other chosen name, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Weight Advantage
card.property: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When immovable object turns to unstoppable force, it's best to just get out of the way.

card.name: Ballot Broker
card.property: While voting, you may vote an additional time. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Merchants and politicians differ only in name." —Queen Marchesa

card.name: Custodi Peacekeeper
card.property: Reveal Custodi Peacekeeper as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including Custodi Peacekeeper. {W}, {T}: Tap target creature with power less than or equal to the highest number you noted for cards named Custodi Peacekeeper.

card.name: Custodi Soulcaller
card.property: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.) Whenever Custodi Soulcaller attacks, return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of players you attacked this combat.

card.name: Lieutenants of the Guard
card.property: Council's dilemma — When Lieutenants of the Guard enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for strength or numbers. Put a +1/+1 counter on Lieutenants of the Guard for each strength vote and create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each numbers vote.

card.name: Noble Banneret
card.property: Draft Noble Banneret face up. As you draft a creature card, you may reveal it, note its name, then turn Noble Banneret face down. As long as you control one or more creatures with a name you noted for cards named Noble Banneret, Noble Banneret and those creatures get +1/+1 and have lifelink.

card.name: Palace Jailer
card.property: When Palace Jailer enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. When Palace Jailer enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until an opponent becomes the monarch. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

card.name: Palace Sentinels
card.property: When Palace Sentinels enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One who ruled willing subjects would need no such protection." —Adriana, Captain of the Guard

card.name: Paliano Vanguard
card.property: Draft Paliano Vanguard face up. As you draft a creature card, you may reveal it, note its creature types, then turn Paliano Vanguard face down. Other creatures you control of a type you noted for cards named Paliano Vanguard get +1/+1.

card.name: Protector of the Crown
card.property: When Protector of the Crown enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to Protector of the Crown instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I gladly offer my weapon and my life to the glory of my sovereign."

card.name: Recruiter of the Guard
card.property: When Recruiter of the Guard enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with toughness 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before a cause can have supporters, it has to have a voice.

card.name: Sanctum Prelate
card.property: As Sanctum Prelate enters the battlefield, choose a number. Noncreature spells with converted mana cost equal to the chosen number can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These halls are sacred. You will be silent."

card.name: Spectral Grasp
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack you or a planeswalker you control. Enchanted creature can't block creatures you control.

card.name: Throne Warden
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, put a +1/+1 counter on Throne Warden.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rulers come and go, but my allegiance belongs to the throne."

card.name: Wings of the Guard
card.property: Flying Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within the city walls, Adriana's falcons hunt vermin of all kinds.

card.name: Arcane Savant
card.property: Before you shuffle your deck to start the game, you may reveal this card from your deck and exile an instant or sorcery card you drafted that isn't in your deck. When Arcane Savant enters the battlefield, copy a card you exiled with cards named Arcane Savant. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Canal Courier
card.property: When Canal Courier enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Whenever Canal Courier and another creature attack different players, Canal Courier can't be blocked this combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most effective roadways in Paliano aren't roads at all.

card.name: Coveted Peacock
card.property: Flying Whenever Coveted Peacock attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Expropriate
card.property: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for time or money. For each time vote, take an extra turn after this one. For each money vote, choose a permanent owned by the voter and gain control of it. Exile Expropriate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few things are more valuable than time or money—and Leovold has plenty of both.

card.name: Illusion of Choice
card.property: You choose how each player votes this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Please vote with a clear head and vigilant heart, knowing each voice is meaningful regardless of the outcome." —Ottavio d'Oro, Electoral Committee Speaker of Paliano

card.name: Illusionary Informant
card.property: Draft Illusionary Informant face up. During the draft, you may turn Illusionary Informant face down. If you do, look at the next card drafted by a player of your choice. Flying

card.name: Jeering Homunculus
card.property: When Jeering Homunculus enters the battlefield, you may goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mklthd had always hated crowds . . . and they had always hated him.

card.name: Keeper of Keys
card.property: When Keeper of Keys enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're the monarch, creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the right price, he'll unlock your path to the throne.

card.name: Messenger Jays
card.property: Flying Council's dilemma — When Messenger Jays enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for feather or quill. Put a +1/+1 counter on Messenger Jays for each feather vote and draw a card for each quill vote. For each card drawn this way, discard a card.

card.name: Skittering Crustacean
Spire Phantasm
card.property: Reveal Spire Phantasm as you draft it. The next time a player drafts a card from this booster pack, guess that card's name. Then that player reveals the drafted card. Flying When Spire Phantasm enters the battlefield, if you guessed correctly for a card named Spire Phantasm, draw a card.

card.name: Stunt Double
card.property: Flash You may have Stunt Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No duelist is without equal in Paliano.

card.name: Archdemon of Paliano
card.property: Draft Archdemon of Paliano face up. As long as Archdemon of Paliano is face up during the draft, you can't look at booster packs and must draft cards at random. After you draft three cards this way, turn Archdemon of Paliano face down. (You may look at cards as you draft them.) Flying

card.name: Capital Punishment
card.property: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for death or taxes. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each death vote and discards a card for each taxes vote.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I did offer them a choice . . ." —Queen Marchesa

card.name: Custodi Lich
card.property: When Custodi Lich enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Whenever you become the monarch, target player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keeping order is a task too important to relinquish in death." —Abrado, Custodi priest

card.name: Deadly Designs
card.property: {2}: Put a plot counter on Deadly Designs. Any player may activate this ability. When there are five or more plot counters on Deadly Designs, sacrifice it. If you do, destroy up to two target creatures.

card.name: Garrulous Sycophant
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Marchesa's poison is delivered by more than daggers." —Adriana, Captain of the Guard

card.name: Marchesa's Decree
card.property: When Marchesa's Decree enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who seize power must have the means to hold it." —Queen Marchesa

card.name: Regicide
card.property: Reveal Regicide as you draft it. The player to your right chooses a color, you choose another color, then the player to your left chooses a third color. Destroy target creature that's one or more of the colors chosen as you drafted cards named Regicide.

card.name: Sinuous Vermin
Smuggler Captain
card.property: Draft Smuggler Captain face up. As you draft a card, you may reveal it, note its name, then turn Smuggler Captain face down. When Smuggler Captain enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card with a name you noted for cards named Smuggler Captain, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Thorn of the Black Rose
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Thorn of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If bribery and intimidation fail, Marchesa turns to her favorite form of bureaucracy.

card.name: Besmirch
card.property: Until end of turn, gain control of target creature and it gains haste. Untap and goad that creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Crown-Hunter Hireling
card.property: When Crown-Hunter Hireling enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Crown-Hunter Hireling can't attack unless defending player is the monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While most in Paliano seek fame through favor, he'll settle for infamy through blood.

card.name: Deputized Protester
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

card.name: Garbage Fire
card.property: Reveal Garbage Fire as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including Garbage Fire. Garbage Fire deals damage to target creature equal to the highest number you noted for cards named Garbage Fire.

card.name: Goblin Racketeer
card.property: Whenever Goblin Racketeer attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Grenzo, Havoc Raiser
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, choose one — • Goad target creature that player controls. • Exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

card.name: Grenzo's Ruffians
card.property: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.) Whenever Grenzo's Ruffians deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to each other opponent.

card.name: Pyretic Hunter
card.property: Reveal Pyretic Hunter as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including Pyretic Hunter. Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Pyretic Hunter enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the highest number you noted for cards named Pyretic Hunter.

card.name: Skyline Despot
card.property: Flying When Skyline Despot enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're the monarch, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

card.name: Subterranean Tremors
card.property: Subterranean Tremors deals X damage to each creature without flying. If X is 4 or more, destroy all artifacts. If X is 8 or more, create an 8/8 red Lizard creature token.

card.name: Volatile Chimera
card.property: Before you shuffle your deck to start the game, you may reveal this card from your deck and exile three or more creature cards you drafted that aren't in your deck. {1}{R}: Choose a card at random you exiled with cards named Volatile Chimera. Volatile Chimera becomes a copy of that card, except it has this ability.

card.name: Animus of Predation
card.property: Draft Animus of Predation face up. As you draft a card, you may remove it from the draft face up. (It isn't in your card pool.) If you removed a creature card with flying from the draft with cards named Animus of Predation, Animus of Predation has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, and vigilance.

card.name: Borderland Explorer
card.property: When Borderland Explorer enters the battlefield, each player may discard a card. Each player who discarded a card this way may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Caller of the Untamed
card.property: Before you shuffle your deck to start the game, you may reveal this card from your deck and exile a creature card you drafted that isn't in your deck. {X}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of a card you exiled with cards named Caller of the Untamed. X is the converted mana cost of that card.

card.name: Domesticated Hydra
Entourage of Trest
card.property: When Entourage of Trest enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Entourage of Trest can block an additional creature each combat as long as you're the monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dim resort to violence, for which the nimble prepare." —Leovold, emissary of Trest

card.name: Fang of the Pack
card.property: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains melee until end of turn. (If a creature has multiple instances of melee, each triggers separately.)

card.name: Leovold's Operative
card.property: Draft Leovold's Operative face up. As you draft a card, you may draft an additional card from that booster pack. If you do, turn Leovold's Operative face down, then pass the next booster pack without drafting a card from it. (You may look at that booster pack.)

card.name: Menagerie Liberator
card.property: Trample Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wild are neither your thralls nor your amusement."

card.name: Orchard Elemental
card.property: Council's dilemma — When Orchard Elemental enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for sprout or harvest. Put two +1/+1 counters on Orchard Elemental for each sprout vote. You gain 3 life for each harvest vote.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fruits for friends, fists for foes.

card.name: Regal Behemoth
card.property: Trample When Regal Behemoth enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Whenever you tap a land for mana while you're the monarch, add an additional one mana of any color.

card.name: Selvala, Heart of the Wilds
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, its controller may draw a card if its power is greater than each other creature's power. {G}, {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Selvala's Stampede
card.property: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for wild or free. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card for each wild vote. Put those creature cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest into your library. You may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield for each free vote.

card.name: Splitting Slime
Adriana, Captain of the Guard
card.property: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.) Other creatures you control have melee. (If a creature has multiple instances of melee, each triggers separately.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My sword is pledged to the defense of this city, not to the throne or this usurper."

card.name: Daretti, Ingenious Iconoclast
card.property: +1: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token with defender. −1: You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, destroy target artifact or creature. −6: Choose target artifact card in a graveyard or artifact on the battlefield. Create three tokens that are copies of it.

card.name: Kaya, Ghost Assassin
card.property: 0: Exile Kaya, Ghost Assassin or up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. You lose 2 life. −1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. −2: Each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.

card.name: Knights of the Black Rose
card.property: When Knights of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Whenever an opponent becomes the monarch, if you were the monarch as the turn began, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hail to the true queen! Long may she reign!"

card.name: Leovold, Emissary of Trest
card.property: Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn. Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm sure we can come to an arrangement."

card.name: Queen Marchesa
card.property: Deathtouch, haste When Queen Marchesa enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent is the monarch, create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and haste.

card.name: Spy Kit
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has all names of nonlegendary creature cards in addition to its name. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Imitation is the sincerest form of treachery.

card.name: Throne of the High City
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Throne of the High City: You become the monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shining symbol of Paliano's true ruler—ambition.

card.name: Affa Guard Hound
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scepter of power is fragile in a calloused hand. —Cho-Arrim saying

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.property: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

card.name: Faith's Reward
card.property: Return to the battlefield all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I thought the wind was ushering me to my final destination, but it lifted me to my feet and I fought on." —Idrus, war priest of Thune

card.name: Ghostly Possession
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

card.name: Ghostly Prison
card.property: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men." —Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

card.name: Gleam of Resistance
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+2 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. Basic landcycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Gods Willing
card.property: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.) Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

card.name: Guardian of the Gateless
card.property: Flying Guardian of the Gateless can block any number of creatures. Whenever Guardian of the Gateless blocks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature it's blocking.

card.name: Hail of Arrows
card.property: Hail of Arrows deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not let a single shaft loose until my word. And when I give that word, do not leave a single shaft in Eiganjo." —General Takeno

card.name: Hallowed Burial
card.property: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather hear the screams of battle than the quiet that follows." —Talara, elvish safewright

card.name: Hollowhenge Spirit
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying When Hollowhenge Spirit enters the battlefield, remove target attacking or blocking creature from combat.

card.name: Hundred-Handed One
card.property: Vigilance {3}{W}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Hundred-Handed One is monstrous, it has reach and can block an additional ninety-nine creatures each combat.

card.name: Kill Shot
card.property: Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mardu archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They never miss their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.

card.name: Pariah
card.property: Enchant creature All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is *not* sad," Radiant chided the lesser angel. "It is right. Every society must have its outcasts."

card.name: Raise the Alarm
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

card.name: Reviving Dose
card.property: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Samite healers never mix their pungent elixir with sweetener or tea. The threat of a second dose is enough to get most warriors back on their feet.

card.name: Spirit of the Hearth
card.property: Flying You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thieves know that a snarl in the night means, "Rob another house."

card.name: Wild Griffin
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Farmers typically keep their flocks at thirteen sheep—one to distract the griffins while they take the other twelve to market.

card.name: Windborne Charge
card.property: Two target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The merfolk call the sky goddess Emeria. The kor call her Kamsa. The two races agree on little except that she offers many blessings to the faithful.

card.name: Zealous Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cower, fiend. The night is yours no longer."

card.name: Bonds of Quicksilver
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sea's reach extends beyond its shores.

card.name: Caller of Gales
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some merfolk choose to rest their fins in the water. I believe wisdom exists not only where we were born but where we were told not to go."

card.name: Cloaked Siren
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That is not the voice of the wind singing on the stones." —Callaphe the mariner

card.name: Covenant of Minds
card.property: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent may choose to put those cards into your hand. If they don't, put those cards into your graveyard and draw five cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before signing anything on Grixis, always read the fine print.

card.name: Deceiver Exarch
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Deceiver Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one — • Untap target permanent you control. • Tap target permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Desertion
card.property: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First the insult, then the injury.

card.name: Dismiss
card.property: Counter target spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Divination
card.property: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you." —Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

card.name: Fleeting Distraction
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first spell taught to young mages, it has spared the lives of many whose hands are too small to hold a sword.

card.name: Followed Footsteps
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Æther can turn a footprint into a blueprint.

card.name: Into the Void
card.property: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cathars have their swords, the inquisitors their axes. I prefer the 'diplomatic' approach." —Terhold, archmage of Drunau

card.name: Kami of the Crescent Moon
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick." —Toshiro Umezawa

card.name: Merfolk Looter
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

card.name: Merfolk Skyscout
card.property: Flying Whenever Merfolk Skyscout attacks or blocks, untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Emeria is a pleasant lie, a figment to hide Emrakul's hideous face. I can only hope to uncover a truth that lies deeper still."

card.name: Mnemonic Wall
card.property: Defender When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd build an entire fortress of them if I could." —Mzali, Lighthouse archmage

card.name: Negate
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You cannot be an Ojutai monk. They prize wisdom and skill, and you have neither." —Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

card.name: Omenspeaker
card.property: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

card.name: Repulse
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Serum Visions
card.property: Draw a card. Scry 2.

card.name: Show and Tell
card.property: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."

card.name: Sphinx of Magosi
card.property: Flying {2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Sphinx of Magosi.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."

card.name: Traumatic Visions
card.property: Counter target spell. Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Vaporkin
card.property: Flying Vaporkin can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mists are carefree. They drift where they will, unencumbered by rocks and river beds." —Thrasios, triton hero

card.name: Vertigo Spawn
card.property: Defender Whenever Vertigo Spawn blocks a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Absorb Vis
card.property: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life. Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Altar's Reap
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible." —Gorghul, augur of skulls

card.name: Avatar of Woe
card.property: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, this spell costs {6} less to cast. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Blood-Toll Harpy
card.property: Flying When Blood-Toll Harpy enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When harpies demand a toll to cross through their territory, consider yourself lucky if they permit payment in coin.

card.name: Child of Night
card.property: Lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

card.name: Death Wind
card.property: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leukin stared at the smoldering angel feathers. "Run!" he screamed to his patrol. "We don't stand a chance!"

card.name: Diabolic Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

card.name: Driver of the Dead
card.property: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

card.name: Farbog Boneflinger
card.property: When Farbog Boneflinger enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here are some bones for you to choke on, dear brother!" —Gisa, to Geralf

card.name: Festergloom
card.property: Nonblack creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The death of a scout can be as informative as a safe return.

card.name: Fleshbag Marauder
card.property: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

card.name: Guul Draz Specter
card.property: Flying Guul Draz Specter gets +3/+3 as long as an opponent has no cards in hand. Whenever Guul Draz Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Harvester of Souls
card.property: Deathtouch Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all." —Bishop Cawle of Elgaud

card.name: Infest
card.property: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather." —Rannon, Vithian holdout

card.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You will scream out your innermost secrets just to make it stop.

card.name: Keepsake Gorgon
card.property: Deathtouch {5}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Keepsake Gorgon becomes monstrous, destroy target non-Gorgon creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Mausoleum Turnkey
card.property: When Mausoleum Turnkey enters the battlefield, return target creature card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When he reaches for his key ring, you should be running for the exit.

card.name: Murder
card.property: Destroy target creature.

card.name: Phyrexian Arena
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spark of resistance against a tide of corruption.

card.name: Public Execution
card.property: Destroy target creature an opponent controls. Each other creature that player controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the executioner did not speak, the villagers got the message.

card.name: Raise Dead
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

card.name: Sangromancer
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life. Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

card.name: Shambling Goblin
card.property: When Shambling Goblin dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Kolaghan send them at us. We kill and raise them. They fight the next wave the Kolaghan send. It's a neat little cycle." —Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

card.name: Stromkirk Patrol
card.property: Whenever Stromkirk Patrol deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'd best move along, human. Our palates are far less discerning than our master's."

card.name: Unnerve
card.property: Each opponent discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me." —Xantcha, to Gix

card.name: Burn Away
card.property: Burn Away deals 6 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, exile all cards from its controller's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your corruption will burn, serpent, until there is nothing left to defile." —Asmala, bloodfire mystic

card.name: Burning Wish
card.property: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.

card.name: Charmbreaker Devils
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Coordinated Assault
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

card.name: Ember Beast
card.property: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions—none of them willingly.

card.name: Fiery Fall
card.property: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Flame Slash
card.property: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

card.name: Gang of Devils
card.property: When Gang of Devils dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, how could I know they'd explode?" —Gregel, township militia

card.name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
card.property: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The enemy is getting too close! Quick! Inflate the toad!"

card.name: Goblin Tunneler
card.property: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best way over the mountain is through."

card.name: Gratuitous Violence
card.property: If a creature you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the Cabal could make a fight to the death more deadly.

card.name: Guttersnipe
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wants to watch Ravnica burn, one soul at a time.

card.name: Hamletback Goliath
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear." —Gaddock Teeg

card.name: Havengul Vampire
card.property: Whenever Havengul Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Havengul Vampire.

card.name: Hurly-Burly
card.property: Choose one — • Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. • Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Ill-Tempered Cyclops
card.property: Trample {5}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A cyclops has two moods: angry and asleep.

card.name: Kiln Fiend
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

card.name: Ogre Sentry
card.property: Defender

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have to appreciate the genius of it. Why bother building defenses when you can just fill the pass with angry ogres?" —Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

card.name: Stoneshock Giant
Sulfurous Blast
card.property: Sulfurous Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player. If you cast this spell during your main phase, Sulfurous Blast deals 3 damage to each creature and each player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Keldons used the toxic vents in the cracked earth to bolster their home's defenses.

card.name: Tormenting Voice
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?" —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.property: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you hear that, Sarkhan? The glory of the horde! I made a legend from what you abandoned." —Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

card.name: Twin Bolt
card.property: Twin Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kolaghan archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They utilize their dragonlord's lightning to strike their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.

card.name: Beast Within
card.property: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

card.name: Berserk
card.property: Cast this spell only before the combat damage step. Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.property: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world." —Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur Forest

card.name: Brushstrider
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Magistrate Ludy agreed to designate land for the brushstriders only after several broken windows and dozens of missing blini-cakes.

card.name: Burgeoning
card.property: Whenever an opponent plays a land, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first vine shows the others where to grow.

card.name: Copperhorn Scout
card.property: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fangren spur may sound louder, but Viridian resurgents claim that the horn of the vorrac creates a truer, more inspiring note.

card.name: Explosive Vegetation
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

card.name: Fade into Antiquity
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are the gods angry at our discontent with what they give us, or jealous that we made a thing they cannot?" —Kleon the Iron-Booted

card.name: Forgotten Ancient
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

card.name: Irresistible Prey
card.property: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The baloth's instincts boiled, its muscles pulled taut, and its razor-spines bristled, as it turned to face—a runt meepling.

card.name: Lace with Moonglove
card.property: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which is more filled with poison: the flower of the moonglove or the minds of elves?" —Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

card.name: Lay of the Land
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

card.name: Manaplasm
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, Manaplasm gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urak froze when he heard it. That was his first mistake. He turned and cast a dramatic ward spell. That was his last.

card.name: Nessian Asp
card.property: Reach {6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not the two heads you should fear. It's the four fangs.

card.name: Netcaster Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

card.name: Overrun
card.property: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Plummet
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elf's blade carved deep into the Eldrazi drone's fleshy lattices. Without a sound, the drone lost equilibrium and tumbled from the sky.

card.name: Prey Upon
card.property: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't find many old werewolf hunters." —Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

card.name: Ravenous Leucrocota
card.property: Vigilance {6}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunger makes a leucrocota dangerous. A full belly makes it angry and dangerous.

card.name: Strength in Numbers
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world." —Uros, Pendelhaven elder

card.name: Sylvan Bounty
card.property: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Voyaging Satyr
card.property: {T}: Untap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "None can own the land's bounty. The gods made this world for all to share its riches. And I'm not just saying that because you caught me stealing your fruit."

card.name: Wild Pair
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, you may search your library for a creature card with the same total power and toughness and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Akroan Hoplite
card.property: Whenever Akroan Hoplite attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fair fight? How could it be a fair fight? We're Akroans. They're not."

card.name: Ascended Lawmage
card.property: Flying Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lawmage's runic script is an act of governance given form: legislation written directly onto the air itself.

card.name: Carnage Gladiator
card.property: Whenever a creature blocks, that creature's controller loses 1 life. {1}{B}{R}: Regenerate Carnage Gladiator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not the foulest or bloodiest act at Rix Maadi by a stretch.

card.name: Coiling Oracle
card.property: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

card.name: Dragonlair Spider
card.property: Reach Whenever an opponent casts a spell, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Swarms thrive in its nest, feeding on leathery bits of discarded wing.

card.name: Duskmantle Seer
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of their library, loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost, then puts it into their hand.

card.name: Gruul War Chant
card.property: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the heart of the wild, the fire in its eyes, and the howl in its throat. Come, join the battle to which you were born." —Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.name: Juniper Order Ranger
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

card.name: Pharika's Mender
card.property: When Pharika's Mender enters the battlefield, you may return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The direst venom becomes a panacea under Pharika's guidance. I bring it to the worthy, clinging at the edge of the abyss."

card.name: Shipwreck Singer
card.property: Flying {1}{U}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks this turn if able. {1}{B}, {T}: Attacking creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Stormchaser Chimera
card.property: Flying {2}{U}{R}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. Stormchaser Chimera gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Champion stood alone between the horde of the Returned and the shrine to Karametra, cutting down scores among hundreds. She would have been overcome if not for the aid of the temple guardians whom Karametra awakened. —The Theriad

card.name: Hedron Matrix
card.property: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is its converted mana cost. Equip {4}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hedrons awoke along with the Eldrazi, forming superstructures that radiated overwhelming magic.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . . even the ground must join our cause." —Ezuri, renegade leader

card.name: Horn of Greed
card.property: Whenever a player plays a land, that player draws a card.

card.name: Kitesail
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kitesailing is a way of life—and without practice, the end of it.

card.name: Opaline Unicorn
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Purphoros once loved Nylea, the god of the hunt. His passion inspired his most astounding works of art.

card.name: Platinum Angel
card.property: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.

card.name: Psychosis Crawler
card.property: Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains." —Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

card.name: Runed Servitor
card.property: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

card.name: Dread Statuary
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}: Dread Statuary becomes a 4/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last reliable landmark in Tazeem just walked away.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them." —Pulan, Bant orchardist

card.name: Rogue's Passage
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

card.name: Shimmering Grotto
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.

card.name: Kaya, Ghost Assassin
card.property: 0: Exile Kaya, Ghost Assassin or up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. You lose 2 life. −1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. −2: Each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.
